trans-unit.source: An <see langword="abstract" /> base class for the exceptions that are thrown if an attempt is made to access the body of a message when it is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 异常的 <see langword="abstract" /> 基类，如果试图访问消息的正文但不允许访问，则会引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When building a custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> it is the responsibility of the implementer to pass the relevant parameters to the constructor called to throw the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />.
trans-unit.target: 当生成自定义 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> 时，实施者负责将相关的参数传递到调用的构造函数来引发 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> class with serialized and contextual information specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化和上下文信息来初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When building a custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> it is the responsibility of the implementer to pass the relevant parameters to the constructor called to throw the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />.
trans-unit.target: 当生成自定义 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> 时，实施者负责将相关的参数传递到调用的构造函数来引发 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When building a custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> it is the responsibility of the implementer to pass the relevant parameters to the constructor called to throw the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />.
trans-unit.target: 当生成自定义 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> 时，实施者负责将相关的参数传递到调用的构造函数来引发 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />。
